type.name: Terrestrial
type.description: A rocky world with liquid water and a breathable atmosphere, capable of supporting diverse life forms.

type.name: Oceanic
type.description: A planet almost entirely covered by deep oceans, with few or no landmasses.

type.name: Barren
type.description: A desolate rocky world with a thin atmosphere or none at all, scarred by craters.

type.name: Desert
type.description: A dry, arid world with minimal water, dominated by vast sand dunes and rocky plateaus.

type.name: Arctic
type.description: A frozen world locked in a permanent ice age, with surface temperatures well below freezing.

type.name: Volcanic
type.description: A geologically active world with constant volcanic eruptions and lava flows.

type.name: Gas Giant
type.description: A massive planet composed mostly of hydrogen and helium, with no solid surface.
